hero_sub: Practical tips and insider information for your stay at Aura Adriatica.

addresses.title: Apartment Addresses
addresses.note: We recommend using Google Maps for accurate directions. Don't be confused by Google Maps 'street view' images – they were taken before the apartments were built.

parking.title: Parking
parking.text: There are three private parking spaces in front of each apartment, all available and reserved for you.

keys.title: Secure Digital Key
keys.text: The apartments have a secure digital lock with a PIN. Before arrival, we will send you the PIN via WhatsApp, SMS, or email.

wifi.title: Wi-Fi Information
wifi.note: Scan the QR code to connect automatically.

registration.title: Guest Registration
registration.text: Following the legal requirements of the Republic of Croatia, all guests staying in commercial accommodation must be registered. To speed up the check-in process, we're sending you a link where you can fill in the necessary details for each guest:

waste.title: Waste Disposal
waste.text: Two waste bins are available: one for mixed waste and one for plastic. These bins are located in the parking lot. To access the mixed waste bin, you will need a key. In the Onyx apartment, the key is on the shelf to the right of the entrance door. In the Olive apartment, the key is in the rightmost drawer of the kitchen island, attached to a keychain labeled 'Lovran'.

tourist.title: Tourist Info
tourist.text: For more information about Lovran and surroundings, please visit [visitlovran.com](https://visitlovran.com/destinacija/lovran/).

footer_note: We look forward to hosting you — have a pleasant stay!
